037 * @generated

039public interface ModelElement extends Marked, Adaptable {

041         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Uris</b></em>' attribute list.
042         * The list contents are of type {@link java.lang.String}.
043         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
044         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
045         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
046         * Element URI's - there might be more than one. See ``NcoreUtil.getUris()`` for more details.
047         * URI's can be used for cross-referencing of elements in a resource-independent fashion.
048         * 
049         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
050         * @return the value of the '<em>Uris</em>' attribute list.

089         * @return the value of the '<em>Uuid</em>' attribute.

106
107        /**
108         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Action Prototype</b></em>' containment reference.
109         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
110         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
111         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
112         * If this reference is not set then EObjectActionProvider creates a new Action using AppFactory in newAction() method. 
113         * If this reference is set and is Action then a copy of the action is created and returned.
114         * Otherwise the reference value it is adapted to ActionProvider which is used to create an action. 
115         * This allows to merge actions and chain action generation. E.g. generate Ecore model documentation and merge it into the Engineering documentation.
116         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
117         * @return the value of the '<em>Action Prototype</em>' containment reference.
118         * @see #setActionPrototype(EObject)
119         * @see org.nasdanika.ncore.NcorePackage#getModelElement_ActionPrototype()
120         * @model containment="true"
121         * @generated
122         */
123        EObject getActionPrototype();
124
125        /**
126         * Sets the value of the '{@link org.nasdanika.ncore.ModelElement#getActionPrototype <em>Action Prototype</em>}' containment reference.
127         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
128         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
129         * @param value the new value of the '<em>Action Prototype</em>' containment reference.
130         * @see #getActionPrototype()
131         * @generated
132         */
133        void setActionPrototype(EObject value);
134
135        /**
136         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Representations</b></em>' map.
137         * The key is of type {@link java.lang.String},
138         * and the value is of type {@link java.lang.String},
139         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
140         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
141         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
142         * Mapping of representation keys to URI's of representation resources. URI's are resolved relative to the model element resource URI.
143         * During object loading resources are loaded and linked to the object. Additional processing depends on the resource type.
144         * In case of Drawio diagrams, diagram elements are semantically mapped to model elements and representation resource root elements are added as children to the object.
145         * See [Nasdanika Core Drawio](../drawio/index.html) and [Nasdanika Core EMF](../emf/index.html) documentation for more information.
146         * 
147         * 
148         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
149         * @return the value of the '<em>Representations</em>' map.
150         * @see org.nasdanika.ncore.NcorePackage#getModelElement_Representations()
151         * @model mapType="org.nasdanika.ncore.RepresentationEntry&lt;org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EString, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EString&gt;"
152         *        annotation="urn:org.nasdanika homogenous='true' load-doc-reference='doc/model-element--representations.md'"
153         * @generated
154         */
155        EMap<String, String> getRepresentations();
156
157        /**
158         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Annotations</b></em>' containment reference list.
159         * The list contents are of type {@link org.nasdanika.ncore.Property}.
160         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
161         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
162         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
163         * Annotations are used to store custom data similar to Java and Ecore annotations. 
164         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
165         * @return the value of the '<em>Annotations</em>' containment reference list.
166         * @see org.nasdanika.ncore.NcorePackage#getModelElement_Annotations()
167         * @model containment="true" keys="name"
168         *        annotation="urn:org.nasdanika reference-type='map: MapProperty\nlist: ListProperty\nstring: StringProperty\ninteger: IntegerProperty' value-feature='value'"
169         * @generated
170         */
171        EList<Property> getAnnotations();
172        
173        // Annotation convenience methods
174        
175        default Property getAnnotation(java.lang.String key) {
176                if (key == null) {
177                        return null;
178                }
179                for (Property property: getAnnotations()) {
180                        if (key.equals(property.getName())) {
181                                return property;
182                        }
183                }
184                
185                return null;
186        }
187        
188        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, boolean value) {
189                BooleanProperty property = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createBooleanProperty();
190                property.setName(key);
191                property.setValue(value);
192                Property ret = null;
193                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
194                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
195                while (pit.hasNext()) {
196                        Property next = pit.next();                     
197                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
198                                pit.remove();
199                                ret = next;
200                                break;
201                        }
202                }
203                annotations.add(property);
204                return ret;
205        }
206        
207        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, int value) {
208                IntegerProperty property = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createIntegerProperty();
209                property.setName(key);
210                property.setValue(value);
211                Property ret = null;
212                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
213                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
214                while (pit.hasNext()) {
215                        Property next = pit.next();                     
216                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
217                                pit.remove();
218                                ret = next;
219                                break;
220                        }
221                }
222                annotations.add(property);
223                return ret;
224        }
225        
226        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value) {
227                StringProperty property = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createStringProperty();
228                property.setName(key);
229                property.setValue(value);
230                Property ret = null;
231                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
232                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
233                while (pit.hasNext()) {
234                        Property next = pit.next();                     
235                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
236                                pit.remove();
237                                ret = next;
238                                break;
239                        }
240                }
241                annotations.add(property);
242                return ret;
243        }
244        
245        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, EObject value) {
246                Property ret = null;
247                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
248                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
249                while (pit.hasNext()) {
250                        Property next = pit.next();                     
251                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
252                                pit.remove();
253                                ret = next;
254                                break;
255                        }
256                }
257                if (value != null) {
258                        EObjectProperty property = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createEObjectProperty();
259                        property.setName(key);
260                        property.setValue(value);
261                        annotations.add(property);
262                }
263                return ret;
264        }
265                
266        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?> value) {
267                Property ret = null;
268                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
269                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
270                while (pit.hasNext()) {
271                        Property next = pit.next();                     
272                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
273                                pit.remove();
274                                ret = next;
275                                break;
276                        }
277                }
278                if (value != null) {
279                        MapProperty property = MapProperty.from(value);
280                        property.setName(key);
281                        annotations.add(property);
282                }
283                return ret;
284        }
285        
286        default Property setAnnotation(java.lang.String key, Iterable<?> value) {
287                Property ret = null;
288                EList<Property> annotations = getAnnotations();
289                Iterator<Property> pit = annotations.iterator();
290                while (pit.hasNext()) {
291                        Property next = pit.next();                     
292                        if (key.equals(next.getName())) {
293                                pit.remove();
294                                ret = next;
295                                break;
296                        }
297                }
298                if (value != null) {
299                        ListProperty property = ListProperty.from(value);;
300                        property.setName(key);
301                        annotations.add(property);
302                }
303                return ret;
304        }
305        
306        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
307        default void setAnnotations(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?> map) {
308                for (Entry<java.lang.String, ?> entry: map.entrySet()) {
309                        java.lang.String key = entry.getKey();
310                        Object value = entry.getValue();
311                        if (value instanceof Boolean) {
312                                setAnnotation(key, (Boolean) value);
313                        } else if (value instanceof EObject) {
314                                setAnnotation(key, (EObject) value);
315                        } else if (value instanceof Integer) {
316                                setAnnotation(key, (Integer) value);
317                        } else if (value instanceof Iterable) {
318                                setAnnotation(key, (Iterable<?>) value);
319                        } else if (value instanceof java.lang.String) {
320                                setAnnotation(key, (java.lang.String) value);
321                        } else if (value instanceof java.util.Map) {
322                                setAnnotation(key, (java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Object>) value);
323                        } else if (value != null) {
324                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot set annotation of type " + value.getClass() + " and value: " + value);
325                        }
326                }
327        }

329} // ModelElement
